moved [[Orthodox Church (Chalcedonian)]] to [[Eastern Orthodox Church]] over redirect: Undo a move that was done with no discussion whatsoever. Title of this page has been highly controversial. Please follow Requested Moves process and get consensus.

moved [[Eastern Orthodox Church]] to [[Orthodox Church (Chalcedonian)]]: Name changed to more accurately represent the name members of the Church use, while also specifying that they are distinct from non-Chalcedonian Christians.
changed use of present progressive to present tense in caption, got rid of the "the" before Eastern Orthodoxy, removed redundancy in rephrasing orthodoxy as eastern orthodoxy in parentheses
